episode.title: National Labor Relations Board v. Catholic Bishop of Chicago

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion to announce in 77-752, National Labor Relations Board against The Catholic Bishop of Chicago and for reasons stated in an opinion with the Court filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Brennan with whom Mr. Justice White, Mr. Justice Marshall, and Mr. Justice Blackmun have joined filed a dissenting opinion.
